```{r}
library(tidyverse)

decathlon <- read_rds("/Users/codeclanstudent/codeclan_projects/dirty_data_project_karolina/task1/clean_data/decathlon.rds")
```


1. Who had the longest long jump seen in the data?

```{r}
decathlon %>%
  select(athlete, long_jump) %>% 
  slice_max(long_jump)
```
2. What was the average 100m time in each competition?

```{r}
decathlon %>% 
  group_by(competition) %>%
  summarise(avg_100m_time = mean(sprint_100m))
  
```

3. Who had the highest total points across both competitions?

```{r}
decathlon %>% 
  group_by(competition) %>% 
  slice_max(points) %>% 
  select(athlete, points, competition)
  
```
